source_title: Two founders, two safety theories, two products—and a framework for knowing which one matches your risk tolerance

insights.insight: It’s noise now. These companies aren’t competing on the same axis anymore. They’re building for different customers, solving different problems, optimizing for different outcomes. Asking which is “bet
